snippet: Brian Foley, the husband of a former congressional candidate, testified in federal court about a meeting with former Gov. John G. Rowland that led to Mr. Rowland’s hiring as a campaign consultant.
abstract: Brian Foley, husband of Lisa Wilson-Foley, former Republican political in Connecticut, takes the stand in corruption trial of former Connecticut Gov John G Rowland; Foleys have pleaded guilty to misdemeanors in connection with their dealings with Rowland, and Brian Foley has agreed to testify as a government witness in exchange for some consideration at sentencing.
lead_paragraph: Brian Foley, the husband of a former congressional candidate, testified in federal court about a meeting with former Gov. John G. Rowland that led to Mr. Rowland’s hiring as a campaign consultant.

headline.main: In Connecticut Ex-Governor’s Trial, a Window Onto Political Strategizing
headline.print_headline: In Connecticut Ex-Governor’s Trial, a Window Onto Political Strategizing
